column5: all i can say is what a hit!!  . unfourtunatly he rolled in my line and broke me off but i cant wait to do it agian. the fish surfaced close to shore from me and 2 other men. they estimated it bettween 18 and 20 lbs. it hit a canadian wiggler in firetiger and the first run was amazing lol. anyways hope to get out and land one lol.  p.s. i landed one for another guy, the fish weighed 12 lbs. lots of fish jumping as well.
They are a lot of fun when they hook up! Good luck on your next one!
Maybe the salmon hooked you.  Go get them.
